item.title: CVE-2024-43123|2024-08-14T14:55:11.967Z -- techeshta -- card%20elements%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Techeshta Card Elements for Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Card Elements for Elementor: from n/a through 1.2.2.
